abstract.t: The PANA Base protocol defines a method for carrying EAP message exchanges over UDP/IP. This means that the PANA Client (PaC) is required to know the IP address of the PANA Authentication Agent (PAA). In many cases, this is not convinient or practical. This document proposes a simple PAA discovery scheme that allows the PaC to determine the PAA IP address without any modification to the base protocol messages or exchange sequence.
